lines.text: I can hardly wait for my uniform to dry so I can see her.
One flash at that pan of yours, and she'll yell for Allah!
I've had more broads yell for me than you and this guy Allah put together!
How about introducing us to the dame we saved, instead of taking all the bows yourself?
Watch me work, and you'll never be lonesome in a strange town!
If the face is anything like the chassis - me for her!
I wish I could tell you in Arabic, what I think of you in English.
The magic of an Asia Minor moon.
There may be no marriage. Mirza's servant has told me strange things of two Americans - - He has even said she unveiled her face before one of the infidels.
